title: Nancy Pelosi Clears the Way for Trump's Senate Impeachment Trial | Yara Shahidi
itunes:title: Nancy Pelosi Clears the Way for Trump's Senate Impeachment Trial | Yara Shahidi
description:
Nancy Pelosi sends impeachment articles to the Senate, Ronny Chieng reacts to tech innovations at CES 2020, and actor Yara Shahidi discusses her role on "grown-ish."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
